name: Tequila Sunrise
description: Named after its visually striking layers, the Tequila Sunrise originated in the 1930s in Arizona but gained popularity in the 1970s in California. This radiant cocktail combines the robust flavor of tequila with the sweet and tart notes of fresh orange juice, topped with a delicate float of grenadine that creates the signature "sunrise" gradient. Served in a highball glass and garnished with a slice of orange or cherry, the Tequila Sunrise is a visual and flavorful feast, perfect for those seeking a sip of sunshin.
instructions: Rim edge of glass in lime juice and coarse salt combined with chilli.
Fill glass with ice and pour over tequila and lime juice.
Top with grapefruit soda and garnish with a grapefruit wedge.
